item.description:
Gaining control over your exposure controls gives you control over your results! Simply stated, good exposure means you get better results, better pictures.

Correct exposure is a key element of good photography. Exposure is also one of the most daunting concepts that photographers need to master. This workshop will cover all the components of good exposure including:

The components of exposure
Measuring light- metering techniques
ISO selection
Understanding and using HISTOGRAMS
Exposure compensation
Difficult subjects


This class will primarily a lecture/conversation. Please come prepared with your cameras, owner manuals and notebooks. We are going to be covering a wide range of shooting conditions and situations that are challenging to get properly exposed.

Gaining control over your exposure tools and techniques is the single biggest step you can make in improving your photography. This workshop will provide you insight and the ability to move your photography forward.
item.name: Understanding EXPOSURE workshop
